content.detailedDescription: Testing case submission for cms ii
content.summary: Test submission - not for investigation

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my dock around 10:30 pm on sunday july 31st. 2011. the night was clear and the stars were shining on the sky. i sat on my reclining chair and looked at the north west sky, when i saw an unusual very bright star. i observed it for a few minutes amazed at the white bright color and what appear to be a few sparkles of yellow, and red and blue/green reflecting from it. 
i told my husband robert, i will go over to the house to get the binoculars. i tried to look at it with them, but my hands were shaking, and could not get a clear and firm view of it.
that is when robert, suggested i was better looking at it with a 20 power spotting scope he has for target shooting,  i placed the scope on a cart table he brought to the dock, and once the scope was secure on it ,we had a great view of the star/object.
it was what appear to be a circular object with pulsating and changing lights in yellow, blue and green colors as well as white. the center appear to be blinking in red at all times. i was so fascinated with it that i could not get my eyes of it. we observed the object going up and down on the night sky, and turning quickly to the right and left, and making really tight circles. at some point i spotted a small white circle on the side of the object that appear to go in or out. i also saw at one point a beam of light going straight up to the sky. this when on for almost three hours.
we came back to the house that sit atop the hill around 1:30 pm and watch it from there. my husband finally called me to bed, so i when in the house, brushed my teeth, and got in bed. my curiosity still alive, prompted me out of bed 10 minutes later to go look at it again. when i went down the stairs and go close to the big family room window i saw that it was gone. now i wish i just had stay still until it disappear in front of my eyes.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright start like object emiting green, red blue and yellow lights

content.detailedDescription: About 2:00 am, the morning of tuesday, august 2, 2011 i heard what sounded like a helicopter circling our building outside.  i am used to the helicopters flying to the hospital, but this one was very close and seemed to be around for a very long time.  i turned off the air conditioner so i could hear it better and it sounded like it was coming back around again, so i got up, opened the balcony door, and saw an object with no clear shape with a red light, a green light, and a spotlight on the front, and maybe a few other lights.  i still thought it may have been a helicopter and my eyes were playing tricks on me, but no, this object was a clear outline, even though the object itself was dark, of a perfect cylinder.  i screamed for my girlfriend to get up out of bed and look at what i was seeing!  she came over and looked, and here it came around again.  it must have circled over us towards bellevue, to autumn, to one of the side streets off overton park, then headed back west towards us again.  my girlfriend saw it, but was too tired to stand and watch with me so she went back to bed (unbelievably).  well, i was on fire and needed someone to talk to immediately!  i was losing it seeing this.  it flew that exact same flight pattern several times.  the 3rd or 4th time i saw it, i grabbed a notebook and a pen and began trying to draw what i had seen.  about that time, it came back around and this time began flying directly towards me.  i had the balcony door open and was looking directly up at it as it was flying over the 3-story house right next door.  this object was very low and very close.  it was probably no more than 15 feet above me.  seeing it from this angle though, it looked fatter around than it had from the side, like a canister or soda can.  cylindrical.  i drew pictures.  this object sounded like a helicopter.  i have to also mention how we were sort of expecting or looking out for something this evening: last night around 1:20am or so, we were watching tv and there was a sudden bang! boom boom, then steady rumble for a few seconds.  it was not lightning.  it sounded like it was right outside our window.  it scared the living daylights out of us, but more so my girlfriend because last week, she was sleeping and i was up watching tv around 1 am and there was a loud bang! like something exploded, busted, or went off like a shotgun (but not a shotgun, as i am familiar with guns) and i also noticed a flash of light through the window.  it scared me so bad, i jumped and my heart sank.  i didn't know how to explain that sound.  the light is unexplainable.  the sound is unexplainable.  i described it to my girlfriend the next day so when it happened last night again, it scared the crap out of her, but she knew immediately what i was talking about from before.  since then, we looked outside and there is no explanation whatsoever for that sound, but also there was a rumble afterwards, but it wasn't like it was coming from the sky.  it was like it was coming from right outside our window.  so, this evening i was sort of anticipating that sound may be occurring again so maybe we could come up with an explanation for it and well, this is what happened instead... the unknown object that sounds similiar to a helicopter in volume and feeling, but the chopping sound of the helicopter blades isn't there and is more of a working-motor sound, like buzzing.  imagine a weedeater at the volume of a helicopter.  that's what it sounded like.  one could have easily mistaken it for a helicopter.
content.summary: Could have mistaken it for a helicopter!  very close encounter

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend was taking me home around 11 pm at night on august 2, 2011. we always travel on back roads, and it is very country and rural with just a few houses. we were traveling on bellview road going towards cedartown from rockmart. i wasn't paying much attention at the time and he asked me if i had seen a bright light in the air pass in front of us while we were on the road, and i hadn't seen it at the time. he said it was too low to the ground to be an airplane and it had different color bright lights. well, i thought he was just joking around with me so i kind of blew it off, but i could tell he kept looking up in the sky looking for something. about 5 minutes down the road something caught my eye to the left of the car, and we both saw it this time. to the left of the car on the driver's side there was an empty pasture, i dont know if it was part of someone's property or just a random pasture, but there was a triangular shaped craft hovering just a few feet above the treeline. it was dark so we couldn't see the whole craft, but it had one light at each point of the triangle, so there were three different color lights. the lights were red, green, and yellowish-white. we could see the outline of the craft and we could tell it was a triangular shape, but we couldn't see details of the craft besides the lights and the shape. it was angled in a position as if the triangle was lying down, like it was horizontal instead of vertical. it wasn't very big but it wasn't small, maybe the size of a short school bus. it was a few feet above the treeline in the air and it was hovering over the pasture slightly moving forward and backwards. all we could do was sit there and stare at it. we were afraid to look away from it because we were afraid it would disappear. i pulled out my camera to get a picture and video tape of it, and my boyfriend was turning the car around. we started heading back towards the craft, but for a split second the trees blocked our view and when we got back out in the open it was gone. just in about 3 seconds it was gone, disappeared. we looked everywhere in the sky for it, but it was nowhere. i don't know of any aircraft that is that fast to disappear in just a few seconds. it left no reflection or no shadow. it was just gone. we didn't get out of the car to investigate because we were a little frightened. we didn't hear the craft make a noise, and it didn't leave any trace of being there, that we know of, because like i said we were a little too frightened to investigate it. i didn't get a chance to take a picture of it which is unfortunate because without proof not many people will believe us. my boyfriend and i both saw it so it wasn't just our imagination. we weren't drunk or high. we were completely sober. we know what we saw..
content.summary: My boyfriend and i saw a triangular shaped craft in the air above a pasture. it had a red, green, and white light at each point of the triangular shape.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down the interstate, i noticed an orange orb hovering in the sky. i thought to myself "that's not a ufo" then as i passed by some trees that were obstructing my view from the right i saw six more orbs hovering. i immediately pulled off to the side of the road and got out of my car. i took 3 pictures with my phone as they were slowly crawling across the night sky. two other drivers pulled over as well to view the crafts. the further away the got they seemed to move faster until they disappeared in the distance. needless to say my heart was pounding pretty hard. about 10 minutes later after i arrived at my destination i saw a helicopter circling the interstate, also police everywhere.
content.summary: Reddish orange glowing orbs hovering above the interstate

content.detailedDescription: I sropped by a friends home that lives quite close to me on the way home to my own house. she has a longish walk from parking to her front door. beautiful semi-clear night and enjoying sky with some whispy high clouds. noticed an satelite and stopped to enjoy its flight across night sky. became slightly obscured by high clouds and reappeared in diagonal trajectory. thought it was optical illustion. continued to watch and several seconds later it "darted" off at 45 degree angel. thats it. nothing sectacular but hey unidentified and very unusuall! thanks, jessa
content.summary: Thoght to be a satalite with unusual movement observed

content.detailedDescription: I was standing with my friend outside of his house smoking a cigarette when i looked up and saw a large (dime to penny sized), extremely bright, silent, amber-ish light in the sky. at first it looked like it was coming towards us, then made a left turn and continued to travel across the sky until trees and houses blocked it from view. it was relatively low on the horizon, but definately above the clouds. there appeared to be a diamond/triangular/prism shape within the light but at the same time it seemed to be the shape of the light itself. the 2 of us agreed that there were no flashing lights or trail following behind, as well as moving silently through the sky. i was both shocked and amazed, as well as highly intrigued. over the past few months my friends and i have seen all sorts of silent lights appearing and disappearing and moving through the skies, all of varied brightness, typically looking like stars. sometimes stars that were stationary all night would start to move quickly and then disappear. our general count is well over 160 lights/crafts from the beginning/middle of may 2011, to today, august 3 2011. however what i saw tonight was the biggest, brightest, most impressive ufo i've ever seen.
content.summary: Large amber-ish light traveling quickly across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving from ohio to colorado one night,with my teenage daughter riding in the front passenger seat.I was focused on my car because it was running poorly, and i was afraid i would break down.My eyes were looking straight ahead,and we were in the middle of a conversation, when my eyes looked ahead but to the left .There were building close to the road,so at first i thought i was looking at a building,but wondered why only the top  lights were all on, and none at the bottom .I wondered if they were having a party up there or something.Then i realized there was no bottom half to this "building".I was looking under the "building."i asked my daughter to look at it, and tell me what that is.She screamed and almost started to cry when she looked at it.I needed her to calm down, plus i never believed in ufo's, but i was looking right at one.I could not understand why cars and semi's  were not pulling over, they had to see it too. it was as close to the building before it, as it could be, and the top of it was about as high as the building next to it.I called my husband in colorado on my cell phone.When he answered, i said "i am looking at a ufo right now." i described it to him. it was grey,shinny like metal, it was flat on bottom,and slight dome shape on top,it had low beam lights all around the bottom edges.It had small windows ,close to the bottom edge.I could see clearly one whole side,bottom and top side. i thought to myself, when it lands, how does it keep from landing on those lights and breaking them.It hovered ,it stayed right beside that building,at the edge of the highway.I thought about calling 911, but they would think i was crazy.I thought" let some one else call". i thought if cars start to pull over, then i will too, but i could not understand why cars were just going by as usual.Then i thought oprah doesn't live that far away, maybe she has some luxury hover craft to take her sight seeing at night,but why so close to a building, and  i have never heard of such a thing.My mind tried everything it could to find logic.My husband got on the internet while we were still on the phone.He said there is a air force base near where i was at, he said they have a new hover craft. i said ok, i feel stupid now, and i am glad i did not call 911, and make a fool of myself, and that must be why people are just driving on,because they are used to it.I am from the country, and figured i must have a lot to learn about life in the city.I hung up the phone, and continued driving. i noticed that it seemed to stay up ahead on my left for several minutes, which did not make sense.Then i passed it on the highway, getting a good look.I thought about pulling over again,and getting a better look, but with my car acting up, and 2 females along the road at night,i figured i should just keep going, i like to make good time, and get there in 24 hours.When i noticed it was now behind me,it seemed like now it was not on the side of the road,it was hovering right over top the road, and i was afraid it was following me.I was getting paranoid.I now questioned the air force hover craft idea.And remembered old ufo movies, where if you pull over or stop, they take you with them.I did not want that to happen, i did not want us to become missing persons.Every time i looked in my rear view mirror,it was the same distance behind me. i needed my daughter to stay calm,so i decided to stop looking back and drive.Besides this could not be happening, it could not be real.My husband had told me it was the air force, and that was that. until last year.
last year i was watching tv , and something came on about ufo's. i was back home at ohio.The program said the air force says they do not have hover crafts! i then knew i had seen a real ufo, and up close.Most the the pictures they were showing on the program of ufo sightings , were small specks way up in the sky.I could have counted the lights if i would of pulled over that night.There was no squinting of eyes , or trying to make something out of a cloud, it was as real and as close as the buildings on the road. it makes no sense to me that it was that low, that close to a building, in a city, and right near a busy 4 lane. it makes no sense cars did not pull over, or go off the road to look at it.But i knew at that moment that ufo's are real,unless we have hover crafts the size of a building, and it is kept secret.I tell people now, that i saw a ufo once.They smile , or turn their head and laugh. nobody asks what i saw, or where i saw it , or when or anything.But i saw it, just as plain as i saw the arch, and any other building, or vehicle.I just could not believe what i was seeing at the time.
content.summary: Grey circle,flat on bottom, slight dome shape on top,round dim head light type lights all around the edge of the circle.

content.detailedDescription: This is at this of 102 am continuing,we are having multiple sightings over huntington wv,and proctorville ohio,white lights streaking and stoping in mid air,then streaking off,we have been observing this untill the time of this report,all of the people who are wintnessing these lights are afraid with the exception of myself and my daughter
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Brilant white light

content.detailedDescription:
These events happened in this order-july 28 night time hour unknown-saw a small orb of light size of baseball outside my kitchen window lated a few seconds and disapeared.Later that night in early morning at 1:58 am was watching late night tv when a flash of light flashed outside my living room window.It was bright it was like a flash on a camera but but brighter.It was so bright it caught my attention.Went outside to see if there was anything more.It was so silent it made me feel nervous.I live in the woods nxt to a stream.This was july 29 2011.
august 2 2011-2:41am was looking out my kitchen window to lok to see if there were any unwanted pest in my lawn.I looked up and saw an orb size of a basketball moving low in the sky flying behind the grove of trees.Ran outside to see if i could see more but it was gone....Last summer 2010 was out in the back yard it was eveing time still light.I got a lawn chair to sit on and enjoy the summer evening was looking towards the west sky right above the tree line a giant silver shinny orb appeared and then disapeared.It was huge bigger than a house and a shinny silver polished metal.Gone in a blink.
july 31 2011 evening was laying down watching tv when i heard a beeping sound in my left ear it wasnt a ringing it was a beeping sound.Before all of this i have had strange ufo dreams mixed with miltary crafts.
content.summary: July 28 2011-night-un known hour-saw a orb of light outside kitchen window later a second or two when i noticed it,

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my backyard in katy looking due south. we are north of old town katy on acreage and still in the country so the sky is dark. i routinely look at the stars and look for satellites. this night was cloudless and very clear. i had been looking south for a few minutes when a light at 45% above me caught my attention. it was momentarily very bright then less so. when it was very bright it almost looked like it was reflecting the sun, but if so it had to be very high at 9:45. 

it was on a north-south trajectory, and i see a lot of satellites on this path. my eyesight has been tested at 20/10 and i can see even the small ones on a night like this. however, this was larger or lower than any satellite. i wondered if it could have been the space station, and at first that's what i thought. when it was overhead, though, it started a tight arc to the west and i watched it move west until about 45% overhead when it just faded out. that was also strange, as it would seem that moving west it would get brighter as it caught more of the setting sun over the horizon. this almost seemed like it was moving away or farther out into space instead. 

i have never reported a ufo before. i've seen some odd things now and then, but nothing that was like this. it was clearly much higher than the commercial aircraft that fly over the house. i would estimate it was at 90-100k, but maybe higher if it was really large. as it flew over it stopped looking like it had a reflection and looked more like it had two lights on it. they were not flashing. this was not a plane. 

could it have been military? maybe. there was no noise, though and the way it appeared and then disappeared was really odd. if was as high as i think it was, it was moving very rapidly, like a satellite. i think i observed the entire thing in a little less than a minute. 

anyway, i just thought i would submit this. maybe someone else in the katy-west houston area saw it as well.
content.summary: Light like a satellite but larger/lower appeared at 90-100k feet moving from south to north then veered west.

content.detailedDescription: There was a stationary sliver of light about a half inch in size from the ground. i don't think it's the moon. it is cloudy out right now so i suppose it could also be a refraction of light from a star. not sure, just thought i'd pass it off.
content.summary: Sliver of light on cloudy night.

content.detailedDescription: Triangular in shape and the whole bottom lit up, hovered then took off.....Hovered over the lockheed martin site on rte 17c in owego, ny. funny part is it didnt show up on cell phone camera when val tried to take a picture of it (i was driving) was triangle, with three white lights one on each corner that and a solid red light in center of bottom i will do my best to draw it up. after hovering it moved slowly toward hickory park in owego, then took off very fast moving south toward pennsylvania . both the wife and i saw it, she first noticed it as i was driving, when we first seen it the entire bottom was lit up in white light.It was high up, but when i got out of the car, i could see it was triangle shape on bottom, due to the light pattern that gave some dimension, the color appeared to be a charcoal brown, but as far as size. if i had to guess with distance and size in our view, i would guess it to be at-least 500 foot from one light to the other to the next, it was much closer than the 747's fly in the area, and i could see more detail on it than the planes that fly around here too, even with it being dark. at first it was just a bright line of light (viewed from rte 434 in front of nys police barracks in owego, then as we moved north (toward the light) the dimensions became more apparent. also made no sound.
content.summary: Triangular shape craft hovered then moved south

content.detailedDescription: Right side came below skyline first, then left side.  it only lasted a couple of minutes i think, i asked my daughter "what is that?" though i already knew, and she replied "a ufo".  what confuses me is that the store we were heading to is only a 3 minute drive and wouldn't have normally taken us more than 10 minutes to get there, get what we wanted and get back home, but an hour had lapsed that night.
content.summary: Beautiful gold triangle that was magnificently awesome!

content.detailedDescription: I let my dog outside a little after 1pm aug. 2, 2011, tues.  i happened to notice to the left of my home an object moving slowly across the sky.  it was approximately 50 to 75ft. up and it looked, almost, like a rectangular bird cage of some sort and it was dark gray or black.  it was too far away to get an accurate size on it but with the size of the trees, i thought maybe it was 50 or 60 feet long. i'd never heard of a ufo with this shape so i watched it for a moment.  it moved behind a stand of trees just outside our subdivision and was heading toward the east.  it moved behind one group of trees still moving slowly in the same direction.  i ran just inside the door to get my cell phone for a picture but it never came out of behind those trees.  i don't know what happened to it.  we live about 30 miles s. of fort knox and i wondered at first if it had anything to do with it.  i can't explain where it went.  i'm 64 year old grandmother of 8 and i don't drink, smoke or do drugs.  i've never reported one before and am very interested if anyone else saw this thing the same day.
content.summary: Let my dog out and just happed to notice it in the sky a stange shaped ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I was thirteen and viewed a giant starship.   it appeared quickly and then disapeared.   i saw green neon bubble fall from ship to neighbors back yard.   10 minutes later a creature  , now i would described it as a grey, at the time i was terrified.   he kissed me an then left.

by the way can you idiots fix your website\\\





it was big,  i was in awe
content.summary: Incredible the size of this thing, i was in awe

content.detailedDescription: On 08/02/11, at approx 1620 hrs ( clear sky , sun light ), i was outside walking my small dog. i just happened to look up in the sky, and saw a white or silver cigar shaped object, which looked to be atleast 100+ feet long, at an altitude of atleast 30,000 ft , heading from the north towards the south , on what would be the eastern edge of lexington, ky. this object was quite high up in the air , and i saw no wings, no smoke or vapor emission trail behind it, and no lights blinking, and no noise. i watched this object, until i lost sight of it, after about a minute of observation. then, about 30 seconds later, i looked back up at the area of the sky where i last saw the object, and this same shaped object had turned around, and was now heading back in the direction it came from ( now going south to north ). at one point, the sunlight reflected very brightly off of the object, for just a few seconds. the object then left my line of sight again, heading north, towards or over the downtown lexington area, but at the altitude the object was flying at, this could have been miles away from lexington. that type of altitude and distance is a bit hard to visually estimate. the object seemed to travel on a level course, and did appear to me, to travel a slight bit faster, than the usual high flying jet planes that i observe, from time to time.  i have to admit that this is the very first object that i have ever seen in the sky, that i had no answer for. i do live near an airport, and we have planes fly over all the time ( both low and very high ). but, even when the planes fly over real high, i have always been able to either see wings, a vapor trail, and/or a delayed engine noise, etc. this object had absolutely none of these things at all. and, i have seen meteors, comets, even the space station fly over, and this object was definately not any of those objects.  * maybe someone who has connnections with norad or a radar station near the lexington, ky area, can check with them, and see if they can advise if anything showed up on their radar around the time of day i have indicated, altitude, direction of travel, etc. tuesday, august 2 , 2011, at approx 1620 hrs ( 4:20 pm ). thank you, karl hiten .
content.summary: White or silver cigar shaped object - reversed direction

content.detailedDescription:
For two weeks starting from the 18th until last night i have observed star-like craft that turns brighter before dimming out of view. these crafts go back and forth or just appear moving before they turn really bright then dimming out. on the 30th of july a craft appeared dimly and as i was talking on the cellphone with someone it made a loud shriek of a noise i had never heard before. this sound was loud yet had had some static-y behind it. it was not like a walkie talkie or anything i had heard before in my life. i feel it was communicating with me. these craft i have observed in the past year since june 27th of 2010 have given me the realization that are in communication with me but that sound really hit home.

these sightings begin in the northwest and northeast sky moving very deliberately and under control doing things i have not observed before, especially the flying back and forth across the sky. very interesting to me.

it has been almost every night since the beginning of july and my observations continue nightly. these sightings occur usually around 10pm every night; some much later and others a little earlier. 

i also observed a black almost opaque smaller object that left me feeling queasy and flew by me almost undetectable. this i only saw once july 28th. i cannot report each one every night as it would be tedious to do so. i am seeing this every night.
content.summary: Two weeks of star like craft appearing and moving across the night sky.

content.detailedDescription: I looked out of the window and watched both for about 3 minutes. they vanished in an instant at one point, never to be seen again. that same day i saw 3 more over the grand canyon
content.summary: I was sitting in a bus and i look out the window to see 2 white spheres. ones was perpendicular to the bus and the other was parallel

content.detailedDescription: I was pulling into the hospital parking lot and behind the hospital there is a river with a hill. i look up and i see this giant flying disk and i had no idea what it was at first but then i realized what it was. there was no doubt in my mind that what i saw was a definite u.F.O. this thing was at least the size of a football stadium. it was circular and it was black and grey and the sun was reflecting off of the top from what i could see. it had no shadow and it made no noise. the first time i saw it. it rose up from behind the hill and hovered there for about ten seconds then it shot up in the sky like a bullet and vanished. when i saw the thing i was in shock and i was very exited. i was driving home and i saw it the second time and it was doing the same thing but it was further away and that's when i snapped the picture.
content.summary: I saw it and snapped a picture

content.detailedDescription: Left work at a shop in hemlock michigan around 6:00pm i was going south on hemlock rd. when i noticed a triangle craft flying over my car. i only seen it for maybe 3 to 5 seconds and could not stop due to the shoulder of the road. i tried to turn and look for it when it passed but the veiw was blocked due to a tree line. i was traveling about 55 mph. the craft had the classic lights in each corner and a red light in the middle. it had the same metalic color as a plane and was not black. i thought it was pretty cool to see. hope to see another one.
content.summary: Triangle craft seen coming home from work

content.detailedDescription: I was at work outside on my 30 minute lunch break talking to a co-worker and smoking a cigarette at around 3:30am. i was taking a puff off my cigarette and happened to glance up for a split sec to see an orangish colored light moving east. at first it appeared to be an airplane but was to low and moving to slow. i watched as it got closer and then it turned a redish color. i could not see any detail on it as it looked like a glowing sphere kind of like a fire ball but without the fire if that makes any sense. it was probably 700ft in the air moving in a straight line right over me. it did not have any sound to it at all which really grabbed my attention. before i lost sight of it over the tree line it turned a whitish silver and started moving north. i don't know what to think of it nor have i mentioned it to anyone. i know for a fact it was not an airplane. it did not have any blinking lights on it, was flying to low and to slow. besides.. it was spherical in shape. to be honest i didn't even want to write this. well thats what i saw. thanks for taking the time to read.
content.summary: Sitting outside smoking on break. happened to glance up to see something odd.

content.detailedDescription:
i've been a aircraft mechanic for 21 years. i spent 10 years as a helicopter mechanic, the rest a fix wing mechanic. i've seen a lot of aircraft, and weird things in the sky, but nothing like this.
     i just walked off a plane i was working on and outta the corner of my eye something caught my attention . i looked up and saw a bright light like a landing light off of a plane, but the run way is to my left to right this light is at a 90 deg. to the run way. the light looks like its coming right at me. i realized there is no position lights, and no wing landing lights, and even tho its dark you should see the silhouette of a out line of a aircraft. with this light there wasn't nothing. then the light retreated from me very fast to a pin point, the size as a star in the sky, then zipped to my right, and disappeared.
content.summary: A bright light that moved away from be at a incredible rate. it faded to a pin pint like a star then shot at a 45 deg. to the right and was gone.

content.detailedDescription: This is my fourth sighting. they are becoming commonplace already. i am expecting them to drop in for tea. i had just gotten to work and parked the car. as i was getting my lunch from the car trunk i looked up ans saw the space station flying over edmonton from sw to ne. i thought i would take a few moments and watch it go over. just as it was over top of me i saw another dark object streaking from west to east,travelling pretty well in a straight line with a slight downward arc. just as it passed under the space station it gave off a brilliant flash of white light, then went dark anddissapeared in the eastern sky. as i have seen these before i was not startled or alarmed. i just thought, "oh! there is another one."
content.summary: My fourth sighting.

content.detailedDescription:
Lights lined up passed overhead and out of sight. neither plane nor balloon.

as related to fi 11726
content.summary: Lights lined up passed overhead and out of sight

content.detailedDescription: My wife was on her way home from work at about 3:15 a.M. on tuesday morning august 2nd when she noticed something to the south/southwest of her that looked strange to her....At first, just intense white/bluish light could be seen but as she approached it, those lights dimmed to reveal there were also a green light and a red light, one at the end of each tip of this boomerang-ish craft....The closer she got, she realized it was a craft/ship of some type....It hovered at about the same height as the light poles on i-275 south (the road she was traveling).....She drove almost right under it, and said she almost pulled over to look at it (which is very uncharacteristic of her, as she is scared of her own shadow) but it vanished.....No trail, emissions ect, just poof! gone.....She told me about this weird feeling she got as she approached it....The hair on her arms stood up and i asked her if it was a feeling of fear, but she said not really, more uneasy...There were no other cars around at the time on 275 as she told me she was swerving due to her looking up at it the whole time..I arrived home about 15 mins after her and got a pen and paper and had her draw this thing and i asked her as many questions about it as i could before she told me she just wanted to go to bed and not think about it anymore....I reported this to the livonia police department and they told me they'd had no reports of anything of that nature, but the officer told me he'd check with surrounding departments and took my name/number ad would contact me with any details...The officer also informed me he had seen a ufo when he was a teenager and didnt think i was crazy at all....I don't really know what to think at this point or if i should leave me email or some contact info in case anyone else saw the same thing she did, but i will continue to research this....I dont have a scanner, but i do have her sketch that she did for me about 30 mins after witnessing this.
content.summary: Dark/dull craft with intense white/bluish lights around boomerang perimeter which dimmed to reveal a green light and a red light at each tip

content.detailedDescription:
We were swimming in the pool and i saw a star like object moving across the sky. it was close to the brightest object in the sky, within 30 seconds it had traveled an unbelievable distance, i swear it was moving faster than anything i've ever seen and it seemed to side swipe another object in the sky when it did i could see a type of vapor kind of like a heat wave. it kept moving a few more seconds then disappeared. it did not look like it was falling, it was amazing.




                               kevin burris
content.summary: Star

content.detailedDescription:
(note: my location is in historic downtown of cheyenne)
  i stepped outside in the backyard to smoke a cigarette and noticed the starry night we have tonight, with light clouds rolling through occasionally. as i observed the sky above, (my body was facing towards the east)i took notice to this object that appeared to be gliding across at a somewhat high rate of speed.(sort of how satellites appear when moving at a low but rapid speed.) at first i thought it was a satellite just very low in the sky, but then i noticed that the color of it was due to the reflection of the city lights which i then realised was way lower than a satellite should be. it was dim but had a reddish/amberish glow(the same sort of color/glow you see on clouds when they're generally passing over a city that contrasts a lot of light.) it almost appeared as if it were gliding across the sky heading towards the south-west. as it moved further away, the reddish/amberish glow of the object became more dim which i assume is from it moving away from the city and as it kept gliding along, the dim faded out completely and i lost site of it. the object appeared to be moving at a set speed, faster than an airplane or helicopter, therefore i couldn't "identify" what it was, also as it moved along in a sw direction, it seemed to start heading in more of a western direction before the dim glow of it faded out. after that, i looked around the sky to see if i could spot any other odd things but decided to head back inside after spending another 5 or 10 minutes obvserving. it was very odd and sort of caught me off guard especially being outside with no lights on and put me in an eery mood. it seems i always spot these weird occurences around this time of year and of course i am never close to a camera or video camera to catch it! if anybody in cheyenne or wyoming has spotted anything strange in the sky, report it! we want to hear about it!
content.summary: Gliding

content.detailedDescription: My 9yr old son and i were laying on our trampoline,(in the country) at night because i wanted to see if he could locate the big dipper. as i knew where it was, we were scanning the sky directly above us. one of the brighter stars suddenly moved quickly from one point to another and stopped(moved about four fingers distance at arms length). then after about 15 or 20 seconds, it changed direction again, quickly moved snd stopped again in a second direction. after a short time it changed direction again to form a path of somewhat of a triangle. then it seemed to gradually drift(no more than that four finger length), and stayed stationary for as long as we kept our eyes on it. i pondered with my son what that could have been, and we came to the conclusion that there was nothing on earth that we know of that could have moved like that.(even though it looked the same as any other star, only a little brighter) coincidently, during the same timeframe we did see a shooting star going from the east to the west (superfast) that left a trail, not related to what we were looking at. the star or object we observed did not move again. it did not leave a trail and did not move as quickly as a shooting star. it did distinctly quickly  change direction each time after stopping all three times. it seemed as if once we were pointing at it stopped moving completely as if it saw we had seen it and it wanted to blend in. we decided to go inside to call a family member to see if maybe we we should call somebody about our sighting. they suggested the police but we felt a little silly. then we came across this website when trying to find somebody to report to. my son was a little worried because we both did witness this together and his imagination was working overtime. myself, now i have no doubt that there are things going on out there where i was always skeptial before. when we went back outside, i thought i had a refrence point as to where it was at, but we could not locate it again.
content.summary: Star quickly moved and stopped and moved again,  and again in a triangle shape and stopped, then gradually shifted and stayed stationary.

content.detailedDescription:
In 1962, i was 20 years old. a male adult friend and i went to the hemet, ca area to hunt rabbits. we parked on the side of a country road at night, so we could sleep in the car and get an early start with hunting. i was asleep in the rear seat of the car, and awoke around 3:00 am, to the sound of loud buzzing, going up and down in volume, and a humming noise similar to a generator. i looked through the car's rear window and saw a large round object hovering approx. 50-100 ft. above a nearby ridge, n/e of our position.The object was shaped like a huge shower head with small openings all over the surface that was facing me. it was turned slightly to the s/e. my first reaction was that i thought it was a military flare of some type because of the bright white light, as well as the fact that it moved slightly side to side. but as i watched it longer, i realized that it was way too big to be a type of flare, although i did observe it was dripping bright white material from the openings that were all over the surface of the craft.There didn't seem to be any set pattern for the "drippings," as they came from different ports randomly.I don't know how long i watched the object but eventually i just went back to sleep. my companion did not wake up  during my encounter, and i asked him later if he heard or saw anything unusual during the night, and he said he didn't recall anything. because of the bizarre appearance of the object, i didn't want to tell him or anyone about it. later,i couldn't understand why i didn't get out of the car to get a better look at the object, since i am normally very curious about such things. in the morning, i didn't observe any damage to the ground underneath the approximate location of the craft.
over the years, i read hundreds of descriptions of ufo sightings and noticed that none of them described a craft similar to the one i saw in hemet that night. in 2005, a famous psychic told me that i had an encounter with a alien ufo in the desert, before i could even finish my question. he said that the occupants of the craft were aware of my presence that night.
then, on march 3,2009, a long beach pd helicopter obtained video of a ufo flying over the city of long beach that was exactly like the ufo i observed in hemet, ca in 1962, but smaller in size. the video on youtube shows the white craft emitting white phosphorus-like drippings from openings on the front surface, just like i saw in 1962. it is a little unsettling to see the same type of craft, after all this time, flying around so close to where i live. i have become aware that i am thinking about the encounter quite a bit, which bothers me, too.
content.summary: I woke up approx. 3:oo am, and observed large shower head-shaped craft emitting bright white light from surface, whith phospherus-type material dripping from openings. did not see it leave, fell back asleep. e;  light
